QuestData.Title: Synthesis of Power
QuestData.Description: Arcane tomes are not ordinary books that happen to deal with arcane matters. There is intrinsic power in them - a power I've learned to synthesize into a single arcane rune.$B$BShould you find an arcane tome in your travels I will give you one such rune. Only the most powerful wielders of magic carry the books I need. In Outland this usually means Kael's blood elves - but you'd be surprised by where such tomes often turn up.
QuestData.LogDescription: Voren'thal the Seer in Shattrath City wants you to obtain an Arcane Tome.$B$BPerforming quests for the Scryers will cause your Aldor reputation to decrease.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you obtained an arcane tome yet, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: As promised, $n. The entirety of the book's raw power, condensed into a single rune.
